properties.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity/Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity/Baca County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 8:52PM MST until January 28 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches,
with locally higher amounts, especially closer to the Colorado
and Kansas state line. Northerly winds gusting as high as 35
mph.

* WHERE...Prowers and Baca Counties.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST TUESDAY
